description.zh: Commento++ 是一个免费、开源、轻量级的评论系统，专为静态网站设计，旨在替代 Disqus。它尊重用户隐私、无广告，并提供现代功能，如 Markdown 支持、垃圾评论检测和 OAuth 登录。该项目速度快、易于部署，且支持自托管以实现完全控制。
description.en: Commento++ is a free, open-source, lightweight comment system designed as an alternative to Disqus for static websites. It offers a privacy-respecting, ad-free commenting experience with modern features like markdown support, spam detection, and OAuth login. The project is fast, easy to deploy, and can be self-hosted for full control.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 尊重用户隐私，无广告干扰
- 相比其他替代方案更加轻量且响应迅速
- 界面美观，优于其他开源评论系统
- 支持一键部署到 Heroku 或 Railway
- 支持自托管，提供最大灵活性和控制权

## 功能列表:

- 支持 Markdown 格式
- 可从 Disqus 导入评论
- 评论投票功能
- 自动垃圾评论检测（集成 Askimet 和 Perspective API）
- 评论管理工具和控制面板
- 置顶评论
- 锁定评论线程
- 支持 OAuth 登录（Google、GitHub、Twitter）和单点登录
- 评论热加载（实时更新）
- 邮件通知功能
- 支持通配符域名
- 原生 SSL 支持，无需反向代理
- 通过脚本属性自定义前端样式
- 页面浏览日志记录与图表展示
- 兼容 SPA（单页应用），支持动态重新初始化
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Respects user privacy and contains no advertisements
- Lightweight and significantly faster than alternatives
- Aesthetically pleasing design compared to other FOSS comment systems
- Easy one-click deployment to Heroku or Railway
- Full self-hosting capability for maximum flexibility and control

## Features:

- Markdown support
- Import from Disqus
- Voting system
- Automated spam detection (Askimet and Perspective API integration)
- Moderation tools and comment dashboard
- Sticky comments
- Thread locking
- OAuth login (Google, GitHub, Twitter) and single sign-on
- Hot-reloading of comments
- Email notifications
- Support for wildcard domains
- SSL support without reverse proxy
- Customizable frontend via script attributes
- Logging and graphing of page views
- SPA (Single Page Application) compatibility with reinitialization support
